- Topic: Re-establishment of "established" multi-family and two-family dwellings
- Summary: The ordinance aimed to distinguish "established" uses from other non-conforming uses and create factors and requirements for the re-establishment of these dwellings. It also considered whether these dwellings should be permitted in all residential zoning districts and recommended standards for their redevelopment near institutional uses.
